rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with tactile tiles and ramps
Open-plan living area with Vastu aligned orientation for positive energy flow
Modern kitchen integrated with island counter, accessible design with lower countertops and wheelchair-friendly layout
Private bedroom on ground floor, designed for optimal privacy with a built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom (wheelchair friendly)
Dedicated library space integrated into the living area for quiet reading; shelves aligned per Vastu principles
Accessible guest room designed with ample maneuvering space

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible ramp and wide door
Large windows for natural light adhering to Vastu guidelines
Interior doorway connecting living room and library
